attributes.background:
cannabis and its affects are admitidly stronger today,than they were years ago therefore the government should treat cannabis addiction as it does alchohol abuse and heroin and gambling addiction i.e medication given,support,and care.
cannabis addiction is not treated seriously and people with cannabis addiction do suffer in the same way as the above mentioned addictions.a way of funding treatment for cannabis addiction is a logical one,legalise and tax it to pay for the treatment of drug addiction.
